abstract: On the final night of the November sweeps period, ABC’s new holiday special “Shrek the Halls” lifted the network to a first place finish among adults 18 to 49 on Wednesday. Attracting an impressive 21.1 million viewers at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates, “Shrek” delivered ratings in the 18-to-49 set higher than any other program on network television last week with the exception of “Sunday Night Football.”
lead_paragraph: On the final night of the November sweeps period, ABC’s new holiday special “Shrek the Halls” lifted the network to a first place finish among adults 18 to 49 on Wednesday. Attracting an impressive 21.1 million viewers at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates, “Shrek” delivered ratings in the 18-to-49 set higher than any other program on network television last week with the exception of “Sunday Night Football.”
